name: CLLocationCoordinate2D
desc: The latitude and longitude associated with a location, specified using the WGS 84 reference frame.

items.name: init(latitude: CLLocationDegrees, longitude: CLLocationDegrees)
items.desc: Creates a location coordination object with the specified latitude and longitude values.

items.name: func CLLocationCoordinate2DIsValid(CLLocationCoordinate2D) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified coordinate is valid.

items.name: func CLLocationCoordinate2DMake(CLLocationDegrees, CLLocationDegrees) -> CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: Formats a latitude and longitude value into a coordinate data structure format.
